entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the recipient of an award for using cool logic in the face of fire. She is described as burying her face in her arms and Harry suspects she has burst into tears.

entities.name: gryffindor house
entities.description: Gryffindor house is mentioned as receiving fifty points for the use of cool logic in the face of fire. Gryffindors are described as being beside themselves with excitement.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the recipient of an award for pure nerve and outstanding courage. The room goes quiet when Dumbledore announces his name.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one giving out awards to Gryffindor house. He raises his hand to silence the room and explains that there are different types of courage.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is mentioned as being tied with Gryffindor in points for the House Cup.

relationships.description: Gryffindor house is awarded fifty points for Hermione's use of cool logic in the face of fire.
Gryffindor house is awarded sixty points for Harry's pure nerve and outstanding courage.
Slytherin and Gryffindor are tied in points for the House Cup.
